trans-unit.source: Specifies how to draw the gradient outside a gradient brush's gradient vector or space.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何绘制渐变画笔的渐变向量或空间之外的渐变。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the available spread methods and their effect on <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示可用的传播方法以及它们对<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush></xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>影响

trans-unit.source: The red line indicates the gradient space.
trans-unit.target: 红线指示的渐变的空间。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>定义自己的渐变空间与其<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>定义自己的渐变空间与其<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: ![Different GradientSpread settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "Different GradientSpread settings") Gradient spread methods
trans-unit.target: ![不同的 GradientSpread 设置](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "不同的 GradientSpread 设置")渐变扩展方法

trans-unit.source: The color values at the ends of the gradient vector fill the remaining space.
trans-unit.target: 渐变向量末尾处的颜色值填充剩余的空间。

trans-unit.source: The gradient is repeated in the reverse direction until the space is filled.
trans-unit.target: 直到空间已满，将按反方向重复渐变。

trans-unit.source: The gradient is repeated in the original direction until the space is filled.
trans-unit.target: 按原始方向重复渐变，直至空间已满。
